message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, see what happens next!
I'll give you a slightly better offer. You can't do better than this, can you?
You're getting a bit greedy, Bob! I'll give you 400k, can you live with that?
You're getting closer, but I'm not there yet. I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting the better end of this deal!
I'm not afraid to walk away, Bob. Meet me at 55/45 or I'm done!
